metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26690 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Apache HTTP Server versions 2.4.0 to 2.4.46 A specially crafted Cookie header handled by mod_session can cause a NULL pointer dereference and crash, leading to a possible Denial Of Service

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26690` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apache2 - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.16
apache2-bin - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.16
apache2-data - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.16
apache2-suexec-custom - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.16
apache2-suexec-pristine - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.16
apache2-utils - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.29-1ubuntu4.16').
